src:
Manchester United Tebus Klausul Rilis Timo Werner
05 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Premier League, Manchester United nampaknya benar-benar serius ingin merekrut Timo Werner. Tim berjuluk Setan Merah itu berencana untuk menebus klausul rilis sang striker dalam waktu dekat.
United memprioritaskan transfer penyerang baru di bulan Januari nanti. Mereka membutuhkan tambahan tenaga untuk mendampingi Anthony Martial dan Marcus Rashford di lini serang mereka.
Nama Timo Werner cukup rutin dikaitkan dengan Manchester United. Striker 23 tahun itu dinilai memiliki kemampuan yang memadai untuk menjadi ujung tombak setan merah yang baru.
The Mirror mengabarkan bahwa United benar-benar serius ingin merekrut Werner. Mereka berencana untuk segera menebus klausul rilis sang striker.

Berapa mahar yang harus disiapkan MU untuk Werner? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Manchester United Redeem Release Clause Timo Werner
05 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Premier League club, Manchester United seem to be really serious about recruiting Timo Werner. The team nicknamed the Red Devils plan to make up for the striker's release clause in the near future.
United prioritize the transfer of new attackers in January. They need additional strength to accompany Anthony Martial and Marcus Rashford in their attack line.
The name Timo Werner is quite routinely associated with Manchester United. The 23-year-old striker is considered to have sufficient ability to spearhead the new red devil.
The Mirror reported that United are really serious about recruiting Werner. They plan to immediately make up for the striker's release clause.

How much dowry that MU must prepare for Werner? Check out the information below.
